title: Forgot Password : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
I have forgotten my password, how do I proceed?
We would want to make entertainment easy for you. You no more need to remember your passwords to login to your BookMyShow.
We have few easy ways to login. They are:
Login via Google+
Login via Email (Enter the OTP you receive to your email ID)
Login via Apple
Login via mobile number (Enter the OTP you receive to your contact number mentioned while logging in)
Note: The option to change the password is now unavailable.
